channel.title: 832 on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in 832 on Barefoot Rob

item.title: area code
item.description: 2 October 1998 I got this in with my phone bill today: Customers with 713 & 281 area codes need to dial 10 digits: New area code coming. Beginning January 16, 1999, you will need to dial the area code plus the seven digit phone number to make a local call in the Houston calling area. If you do not dial the area code before the seven-digit phone number, you will reach a recording asking you to do so.
